title: 2br / 1 ba Apartment near Clark Park
description:
Spacious 2 bedroom 1 bathroom apartment available to sublet from May 1st - July 31st with the opportunity to resign at the end of the sublet. Through the front door, you'll find a large closet and entryway that opens up into what we've used as a dining room. Just off the dining room is a quaint kitchen equipped with an oven, microwave, dishwasher, refrigerator, and ample cabinet space. The large living room has lots of natural light as well as a beautiful view. This room was large enough to double as a home office and living room.
Back through the dining room, you'll find a hallway that leads to 2 bedrooms and a bathroom. We used the smaller bedroom as a spare room, office, and musical space and this space also has a large closet for extra storage, a ceiling fan, and great natural light. Further down the hallway is a small bathroom with a full size bathtub and shower. The 2nd and final bedroom is slightly larger than the 1st and has a large closet, room for multiple dressers, queen sized bed, and views of both the city skyline and a neighboring church.
This unit is on the 4th floor of the building and is accessible by both elevator and stairs. Access to the shared roof deck with 360 degree views is right next to this unit, and you'll often find dogs playing in a small grassy yard that is accessible from the 1st floor. Each floor has its own laundry room that is shared by tenants on the floor. Street parking is very easy in the area with parking either right out front or right along Warrington avenue. We require the first month, last month, and a security deposit before move-in. Tenant pays gas, electric, and internet. And yes, pets are allowed :)

title: Sitting out there, you wouldn’t even know you were in the city.
description:
**************** SEND ME YOUR PHONE NUMBER ****************
Whether you like to entertain, work from home, or just want some extra space for some quiet time, this home is for you! Pride of ownership, warmth, city living with suburban feel is what this home offers. As you enter your new home, you’ll be greeted with custom tile work in the spacious living room that also offers a gorgeous bay window. Right from the living room you'll enter the formal dining room that offers a very warm atmosphere where you can enjoy family dinners. And for an even more relaxed atmosphere, have a cozy meal around the island or at the breakfast bar in the oversized kitchen. The large eat-in kitchen boasts granite countertops, beautiful oak wood cabinets, stainless steel appliances (included in the sale), a beverage fridge, and a bonus built in wine rack. Kitchen was completely gutted and remodeled. This kitchen is also larger than most kitchens in other homes in the area. A dream kitchen indeed. Off to the side of the kitchen, there’s a bonus room with a beautiful tray ceiling that can also be used as a fourth bedroom, office. This room has added 144 square feet of living space to the home. Other possible uses could be a family room, home gym, play room, prayer room, etc. If that’s not enough space to get away, you could slip downstairs to the fully finished basement with a custom made bar that can be relocated. This extra living space also provides a powder room, laundry room and a bonus room for extra storage space or workshop. There is even access to the back yard from here. Speaking of the back yard, you’ll be moving into this home at just the right time to enjoy the partially in-ground pool, covered porch, and large fenced-in private yard. Sitting out there, you wouldn’t even know you were in the city. It’s quiet and spacious and even has a large shed. When it’s time to retire for the evening, there are three well sized bedrooms and two full bathrooms on the second floor. Master bathroom is original but very well maintained and walls recently painted. The hall bath was updated with new ceramic floor tiles, fixtures and sink. As if all of this wasn’t enough, this home also has upgraded central air and heating systems and a new water heater. The roof is still under warranty. Location is prime. Supermarkets, public transportation, and malls are all nearby. Ready to move in? Schedule your appointment today! You won't be disappointed.OPEN HOUSE: Saturday 4/2/2022 1:00 pm to 3:00 pm
